title: Rafe Chang
text: Data scientist with a global perspective, skilled in applying advanced machine learning, statistical modeling, and geospatial analysis to drive sustainable energy solutions. Experienced in analyzing electric vehicle and lithium-ion battery markets, solar energy feasibility, and energy efficiency dashboards. Passionate about using data to support energy innovations and climate-positive actions.

title: Rafe Chang
text: Data scientist with a global perspective, skilled in applying advanced machine learning, statistical modeling, and geospatial analysis to drive sustainable energy solutions. title: Rafe Chang
text:
Professional Experience
Data Scientist (Capstone) @ Pacific Salmon Foundation
To support biologists in modeling salmon survival, I developed predictions for outmigration timing, enabling efficient resource allocation for tagging fish in rivers. My contributions included:

Wrote complex SQL queries to retrieve data from a relational database with 15 interconnected tables
Conducted exploratory data analysis for data cleaning and preprocessing with pandas
Experimented with multiple modeling approaches, including SARIMAX, linear regression, and logistic regression, before selecting and developing a final XGBoost model

Branding Strategy& Business Analytics Extern @ Beats by Dr. Dre
To evaluate the effectiveness of its advertisement among Gen Z audiences, I designed and conducted a comprehensive marketing research project. My contribution include:

Designed research framework based on conversion funnel; successfully sampling 5.57% of the target population to gather primary data

Analyzed result with hypothesis testing (chi-square analysis) and perceptual mapping (dimensionality reduction)

Student Consultant @ Union Pacific Railroad
In response to trends in deforestation, renewable diesel, and domestic electric vehicle production, I identified potential customers and developed logistic plans accordingly. My contribution include:

Analyzed the U.S. electrical vehicles market and fit linear modeling to extend on existing prediction
Researched materials of various Lithium-Ion battery models; projected mineral demand by combining findings from electrical vehicle market analysis
Developed logistic plans and estimated potential revenue after identifying the site locations along the battery production chain

Marketing Specialist @ Nebraska College Rodeo Program
In the months leading up to the annual rodeo, the program sought ways to increase attendance; I boosted team members’ online presence. My contribution included:

Developed webpage using HTML and CSS
Shoot, edited and posted content on Instagram; analyzed performance metrics to optimize engagement

title: Rafe Chang
text:
Education
Master of Data Science @ University of British Columbia-Vancouver

Relavent Courses: Supervised and Unsupervised Learning (sklearn, PyTorch), Spatial and Temporal Modeling (geopandas, statsmodels), Data Visualization (matplotlib, Vega-Altair, ggplot2), Database (PostgreSQL), Software Development, Cloud Computing (AWS), Bayesian and Frequentist Inference (r), Experimentation and Causal Inference

Bachelor of Science in Business Administration (Honors) @ University of Nebraska-Lincoln Bachelor of Science in Politics, Psychology, Law, and Economics (Erasmus) @ University of Amsterdam

title: Hi from Vancouver!
text:
Hello! This is Rafe; I am a recent graduate from the University of British Columbia. I studied data science- which is a lot of machine learning, statistics, and visualization, with some algorithm, database, and cloud computing. Besides data science, I am passionate in everything energy, with more in-depth knowledge in perovskite and the electricity grid. Currently learning about climate change at Terra.do!
Besides data and energy, I enjoy skiing, surfing, and house music;)

title: Rafe Chang
text: I create data products and content to deliver insights on energy and the environment.

title: Rafe Chang
text:
Coding Projects

climateDebunkers

Description: A lightweight language model classifying quotes into eight different categories.
Tools Used: NLPAug, DistilBERT, Optuna
GitHub Repo: CimateDebunk



pvpmSimulator

Description: A web app providing real-time and customizable simulation that calculates the solar energy potential loss caused by PM2.5.
Tools Used: Streamlit, pvlib-python, AirNow.gov API
Web App: pvpmSimulator (use Chrome)



salmonSavers

Description: A pipeline predicting salmon outmigration timing to optimize fieldwork timing for salmon survival analysis.
Tools Used: PL/Python, PL/SQL, XGBoost
GitHub Repo: Bottlenecks to Survival



solarSavers

Description: A dashboard assisting Canadian homeowners to choose the optimal panel by calculating energy and financial savings at a given location.
Tools Used: GeoPy, GeoPandas, Dash
GitHub Repo: Solar Savers
Dashboard: Solar Savers
